plot: In a show produced by the mobile phone company Orange, a famous person has an intimate chat with a female DJ whilst picking music tracks which have a special significance for them in their lives.
plot_en: In a show produced by the mobile phone company Orange, a famous person has an intimate chat with a female DJ whilst picking music tracks which have a special significance for them in their lives.
plot_es: In a show produced by the mobile phone company Orange, a famous person has an intimate chat with a female DJ whilst picking music tracks which have a special significance for them in their lives.
title: Orange Playlist
